Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
